mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_message ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, user_id, topic_id, content, parent_id) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{userId}, #{topicId}, #{content}, #{parentId});
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, user_id AS userId topic_id AS topicId, content, parent_id FROM b_message WHERE topic_id = #{topicId} ORDER BY gmt_create ASC;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_message WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
